str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Middle - 1st Person Singular
str2: From para and ginomai; to become near, i.e. Approach; by implication, to appear publicly.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To send, transmit, permit to go, put forth.
A letter, dispatch, epistle, message. From epistello; a written message.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From dokimos; to test; by implication, to approve.
To carry, bear away (sometimes with violence). From apo and phero; to bear off.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
From chairo; graciousness, of manner or act.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
Of Hebrew origin; Hierusalem, the capitol of Palestine.
